description: Immersed in nature, La Cerreta Osteria is a rural inn where you can sleep, relax in hot springs and enjoy fine cuisine. The two tasting menus have a vegetable focus and are accompanied by biodynamic wines and fermented juices. The Ristorante della Cerreta is open for dinner every day, serving just one single daily menu on which local specialities take pride of place.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
